name: PrismScroll Empire
description:
Welcome to PrismScroll Empire : a clean, simple, and quick dice roller for all your EotE RPG games.

Features
- Simple dice pool selection
- Save and name commonly used dice rolls
- Easy to read results, displaying results per dice, total results of all dice and then a breakdown of the final effects.
- Motion sensing rolling capability
- Roll up to 42 dice at once
- The option between EotE symbols and Genesys symbols
